page.title: 19CAMPSITE AND YOUTH HOSTEL.
page.content: YOUTH HOSTEL. The youth hostel at High Beech has been established for 18 years,but the actual building itself has been around since 1926.The youth hostel caters for 44 people.All the people who work here are all voluntary.Visitors come to the hostel from all over the country,Germany, France,Holland,Denmark,America,Brazil, Australia and New Zealand.The hostel has showers,toilets,three dormitories,a common room and a kitchen.The youth hostel is closed in Winter,but open in Summer. DEBDEN CAMPSITE:Debden campsite is owned by Newham Council.It used to be a farm,but in 1954 it was turned into a campsite.The campsite has tourists coming from many different countries,such as Italy & Spain.The amount of tourists that come depends on the weather.The campsite has space for 225 tents and caravans altogether.
